purpose: Facilitate the creation and assessment of autonomous agents for IT operations (AIOps) using a holistic approach
principle: Leverages machine learning and automation to enhance IT operations through intelligent agent design and evaluation
reusability: Modular design with APIs and plugins for easy integration into existing AIOps solutions
limitations: Primarily focused on IT operations, may require customization for specific environments or use cases
name: AIOpsLab
description: A holistic framework to enable the design, development, and evaluation of autonomous AIOps agents.
highlight: Comprehensive framework for developing and evaluating autonomous AIOps agents
